Name: Trade Winds
Ingredients: 5 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime slice wheel (dehydrated).
Review: Coconut water adds dilution and subtly flavours this brandy-based cocktail with sweet vermouth and subtle notes of chocolate and aromatic bitters.
History: Created in 2015 by Daniel Bovey at Be At One in Bristol, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Trade Winds contains 141 calories
